content: anthropologie inspired ivory tower size made fits 21 inch circumference head my head this pattern is done in mostly tapestry crochet i attempted to explain what you need to do in the directions but if it s confusing at all there are plenty of books with tapestry crochet tutorials and there are plenty of tapestry crochet tutorials online materials needed 2 skeins of vanna s choice yarn linen cc 1 skein of tlc essentials linen mc 4 5 mm crochet hook 6 mm crochet hook j small amount of red yarn small amount of green yarn or 2 red buttons and 1 green button tapestry needle optional materials stitch markers to keep track of rounds if you use stitch markers place them in the first stitch of each round and then move them at the start of each round to the new first stitch *join cc at start of 3rd round *this pattern is worked in rounds without joining at the end of the round in other words you will not slip_stitch to the first stitch at the end of every round nor will you chain 1 at the beginning of every round instead you will complete the round and when starting the next round you just crochet into the first stitch of the previous round i like this method though it can require a stitch marker to keep track because it ensures there is no visible seam where the rounds begin/end instructions 1 3 single_crochet into magic_ring and join with a slip_stitch 2 3 single_crochet into each single_crochet around 9sts do not join but continue working in rounds use a stitch marker if necessary to keep track of stitch number 1 of each round 3 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st x4 2 single_crochet in last st do not join 14sts at this point you will join the cc and crochet in tapestry crochet i e carry the cc along with the mc and crochet the cc inside the mc when you are told to switch to the cc you will carry the mc along with the cc and crochet the mc inside the cc 4 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 21 sts 5 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 28 sts 6 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 35 sts 7 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 42 sts 8 single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 49 sts 9 single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 56 sts 10 single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 63 sts 11 single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in next st x7 do not join 70 sts 12 single_crochet in
